verses.text: For God so loved the world that he gave his only Son...
verses.commentary_en: God's love is the foundation of Christian life. Reflect on receiving and sharing that love.
verses.commentary_zh: 神的爱是基督徒生活的根基。反思接受并分享这爱。

verses.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
verses.commentary_en: Trust that God provides and leads you through every valley.
verses.commentary_zh: 信靠神会供给并带领你走过每个低谷。
